title: Tofu peanut stir-fry
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '500g (1 1/4 lb) prepared stir-fry vegetables', '1/2 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 eggs, beaten', '150g (5 oz) cornflour', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '400g (14 oz) firm tofu, drained and cubed', '100ml (4 fl oz) vegetable oil', '175ml (6 fl oz) peanut sauce', '30g (1 oz) chopped peanuts']
